column5: I am a US Lund dealer, and have used them. But, I think they do retail, too.. I think you can order stuff on-line from them.www.ryjus.com
Funny Thing! I live 5 min from Ryjus ?:banghead: Thanks fellow fishermen hope to see you on the water soon!
Where in Winnipeg can you buy Lund clothing and Lund hats?
>Where in Winnipeg can you buy Lund clothing and Lund hats? McDee, I {Toronto} ordered mine from http://www.lundgear.com/cart.php ITs in Canadian Dollars
Do a search on the lund website for dealers in winnipeg. There is probably one on dugald road. if not there, somewhere in st james maybe. I know they sell lunds a couple places in the city.

on route 90 the new place is set up winnipeg watersports i think its called the newest oficial lund dealer in winnipeg right near wellington on the west side manitoba .... a 100,000 lakes how many walleyes ???? i will never have enough time....
mcdee, I have two never worn Lund hats from when I bought my Lund in 2oo2. They have the lund boat with Yamaha motors on them.
I'll check that out. Thanks MW:cheers:

Thanks for the offer but the wife wants the mostly Black with Lund in Red and I don,t know what to tell other fishermen when they ask me, Wheres your Yamaha when our boat is sporting a Mariner?:thanks2:
Go to Lund's webb site and order a cap.
Ryjus on wall st in Winnipeg is the Lund dist ,Don is the owner great guy go see him
didn't know ryjus sold direct thanks chris manitoba .... a 100,000 lakes how many walleyes ???? i will never have enough time....
